greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: List of pairs n, 3n, where n is the least unused number so far.
comment: A permutation of the natural numbers.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
mathematica: A007417 = Select[ Range[100], (# // IntegerDigits[#, 3]& // Split // Last // Count[#, 0]& // EvenQ)&]; a[n_] := If[ OddQ[n], A007417[[(n+1)/2]], 3*A007417[[n/2]] ]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 01 2013, from formula *)
program: f (x:xs) = x : x' : f (delete x' xs) where x' = 3*x
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 22 2004
